title: Pixel 2 XL Keeps Crashing/Resetting
content:
Ok I'm now on my 3rd Pixel 2 XL, all with Verizon, and I keep running into the same issue, where they'll just randomly restart. Often I don't even realize it's done this, just when I go to use the phone it'll tell me it had just restarted, so it often is restarting even when not in use. But it will also restart at the worst times, I work in emergency response and it'll drop in the middle of a phone call. This is a personal phone that are kept safe and doesn't have weird programming, I barely even use 3rd party apps, mostly just Outlook and my local credit union.

I've tried replacement phones, factory resets, even while in safe mode it will still crash and restart. I have removed it's case, even though it wasn't like an OtterBox or anything that'd block in heat or anything, just a normal $10 case. And the latest phone also has a weird issue where it keeps resetting Google Assistant so it does the greeting all over again when I go to use it, I only mention in case my "Google" account is somehow corrupted and related (doubtful but at this point just tossing out info and speculation as it's all I ever got left). I've cleared the assistant cache a few days ago but that didn't help.

Short of getting a non Google phone I'm not really sure what else I can do at this point. I work in IT and my brother in law works for Verizon, and between the two of us we just can't figure out why this model keeps crashing for me.
